page.title: 09INDUSTRY
page.content: {FURNITURE MAKER AND WOOD SUPPLIER}This three man business makes hard wood furniture and sells timber.They have a thousand customers a year of which only 25/35 is furniture that has been commissioned.They have 15 types of hard wood in the outbuildings and buy kiln dried timber from all over the world.Some furniture is commissioned by Arcgitects and Interior Designers.They advertise in local papers. {FARM MACHINERY WORKSHOP}They repair agricultural vehicles.Customers' visits,in the main Farmers,mainly come from within a 30 mile radius.Four staff are employed.Part of their work is to service vehicles on outlying farms.
